imdb.title: Beastars
imdb.plot: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a reclusive wolf's complicated relationship with a kindly rabbit is tested by a classmate's murder, a charismatic deer's influence, and his own burgeoning predatory instincts.

episodes.title: A Teen's Never-Ending Alarm
episodes.plot: Legoshi has regained his peaceful school life. However, what is different from before the summer break is that he finally confessed to Haru his feelings and that Louis is not present in his last year at the academy. A sound resounds in Legoshi's ears and a popular ghost story in the academy has recently appeared. The ghost of Tem who was killed is said to appear at the academy at midnight.

episodes.title: The Gray Police Hound Runs
episodes.plot: The All-Organism Council Meeting is discussing Cherryton's Beastar situation. Meanwhile, Legoshi is tasked by Rokume to investigate and find clues about who Tem's killer might be. Louis is the new boss of the Shishigumi.

episodes.title: Changes
episodes.plot: After taking a drastic step against the Shishi-Gumi, Louis faces an impossible choice. The drama club gets a new, very confident member.

episodes.title: Entangled
episodes.plot: Legoshi is attacked by a powerful carnivore. As Louis earns the trust of the Shishi-Gumi, he loses his own health and peace of mind.

episodes.title: Call it Like it is
episodes.plot: Juno visits Louis at the Black Market and attempts to convince him to go back to school, but Louis's determination is unshakable. Legoshi, who became Gohin's disciple, cuts off his fur to disguise himself so that the Shishigumi won't recognize him, and begins a harsh training where he remains in school during the day and in the Black Market during the night.

episodes.title: Fly, O Corrupt One
episodes.plot: Louis forces Ogma to sign him off the school. Legoshi fights his instincts due to the training that Gohin has imposed on him. However, he realizes that what he faces is "someone who was once alive" and manages to control his own desires by respecting life. Haru appears in front of Legoshi, who is exhausted after returning to the academy, and he proposes to her. Bill challenges Legoshi to a tug of war using their teeth.

episodes.title: Unforgettable Sweetness
episodes.plot: While alone in the locker room, Legoshi tastes the water bottles of every male carnivore member of the drama club in order to identify Tem's killer. After a horrifying incident during practice, Legoshi and Riz take Kibi to the infirmary, after which Legoshi reveals to Riz that he knows he is the culprit. Before they can start fighting, Pina interrupts them and blackmails Riz. Due to this incident, the school is set to become segregated and all clubs suspended, but the club members are not giving up.

episodes.title: Laughing at the Shadows We Cast
episodes.plot: Sheila doesn't want to only be used in Peach's photos just for "likes", so she invites her to a day of shopping. Legoshi learns about the strength of his limbs by stopping a ferocious meat-addict as part of Gohin's training. Juno is offered the main role in the school play, but after spending some time with Haru in the gardening club, she considers herself unfit to be a candidate for the Beastar title. After a visit to a hyperdrugs store, Ibuki reveals to Louis that their childhoods aren't so different.

episodes.title: A Busted Electric Fan
episodes.plot: Legoshi steadily gains strength thanks to Gohin's training, but is impatient for not being strong enough to defeat a brown bear. Tao visits Kibi and cries tears of joy because the surgery was a success. At the Black Market, Legoshi accidentally runs into Louis and the Shishigumi. While alone, Legoshi tries to persuade Louis to leave this life, but he insists that he was always a part of it. At the drama club, Riz's hypocrisy and nice bear act infuriates Legoshi, but Pina steps in to calm things down.

episodes.title: The Chef's Whimsical Suspense
episodes.plot: While preparing dinner for his roommates, Riz reflects on what happened with Tem and the situation of Legoshi and Pina knowing he is the culprit. Haru and Legoshi have a talk and he vows to not let her be unhappy anymore. After a traumatising encounter with Riz in the bathroom, Pina gives a stunning performance during rehearsal, leaving the drama club members stunned. Riz and Legoshi get into an intense fight, but circumstances cause them to postpone their fight until New Year's Eve.

episodes.title: Scatter Your Scales
episodes.plot: To grow stronger for his New Year's Day confrontation with Riz, Legoshi tries ingesting a moth larva and has an intense hallucination.

episodes.title: A Revolutionary Feast
episodes.plot: It's New Years Eve. Legoshi challenges Riz to a duel over his beliefs. Riz tries to eliminate those who try to contaminate the cherished memories of him. And Louis sacrificed an irreplaceable bond to see his resolve. Youth, ego and fierce feelings collide, and the bloody youth of the beasts opens the final curtain.

episodes.title: The Full Moon chooses which Beast to illuminate
episodes.plot: A brutal murder takes place at a school populated by anthropomorphic animals. In the aftermath, Legosi the grey wolf has a sudden encounter with the dwarf rabbit Haru and ends up developing carnivores urges.

episodes.title: The Heart of the School is in the Garden
episodes.plot: Legoshi ponders his own ferocious impulses; an altercation at breakfast unsettles him further. The theater students prepare for their play.

episodes.title: A Wolf is Born
episodes.plot: Legoshi tries to sort through his conflicted feelings for Haru, as a wolf and as a male. Meanwhile, he suffers venting from an injured and frustrated Louis.

episodes.title: Let the Holy Grail Soak
episodes.plot: Louis hands over his role to the tiger Bill, and Legosi takes Bill's role. However, when Legosi discovers a secret about Bill that causes them both to fight and nearly wreck the play, only Louis can save the day.

episodes.title: Two Sides to the Story
episodes.plot: While Legoshi is still insecure about his divided but growing feelings for Haru, she starts to see him in a better light.

episodes.title: Blurred Vision - Dream or Reality?
episodes.plot: Legoshi saves the wolf girl Juno from bullies. Later, he and his carnivore friends take a trip across town and encounter a market of herbivores selling their body parts. A horrified Legosi gets counseling by a panda doctor.

episodes.title: Below the Fur Coat
episodes.plot: Legosi runs into Louis outside Haru's garden clubhouse, and they realize that both of them have an interest in Haru. This revelation finally pushes Legosi to realize his true feelings for Haru.

episodes.title: Caught like Floss in a Canine's Tooth
episodes.plot: Legosi gets into an awkward situation with Haru, but when a blackout occurs and causes a panic, he goes and looks for her.

episodes.title: Into the Lion's Den
episodes.plot: Haru is kidnapped by Shishigumi, a criminal lion gang whose head intends to eat her. Louis is expressly forbidden to do anything, so it's up to Legosi to save her.

episodes.title: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.plot: Legoshi unleashes his feral instincts and battles through the Black Market to find and rescue Haru.

episodes.title: To the Neon District
episodes.plot: Legoshi rescues Haru, with unknown help from Louis. The two wander through town and eventually take refuge at a love hotel, where Legoshi finally confesses the truth to Haru.

episodes.title: In the Storm's Wake
episodes.plot: At the Meteor Festival, Juno tries to force a connection with Legoshi while he tries to resolve his relationship with Haru.
